title: Who am I?
content: I am a student from Germany who is passionate about technology and programming. I am currently pursuing my Master's degree in Computer Science in Tuebungen.

title: I speak multiple Languages
content: Apart from programming languages, I am proficient in German, Russian and English. Currently I am studying Japanese, mostly by myself.

title: Projects and experiences
content:
I believe in learning by doing, especially in fields that interest you personally. I've worked on several personal and collaborative projects and have gained experience in various fields.
